channel.title: CVE Feed for Grand Vice info Co. -- webopac7
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Grand Vice info Co. -- webopac7

item.title: CVE-2021-42838|2024-09-17T03:33:13.463Z -- grand%20vice%20info%20co. -- webopac7
item.description: Grand Vice info Co. webopac7 book search field parameter does not properly restrict the input of special characters, thus unauthenticated attackers can inject JavaScript syntax remotely, and further perform reflective XSS attacks.
